message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me and is worth $1200000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1150000. This represents a significant saving for you, while still allowing me to receive a substantial return on my investment. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
